newsitem.title: USA: Atrix says Heartland has 8.8 pct stake.
newsitem.headline: Atrix says Heartland has 8.8 pct stake.

text.p: Atrix International Inc said Thursday it was notified that Heartland Advisors of Milwaukee, Wis., in a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, reported it now owns 500,000 shares, or 8.8 percent of Atrix' outstanding common shares.
It said the filing indicated the shares were acquired for investment purposes.
"This significant institutional investment and holding in Atrix International affirms our strategic direction and serves as a vote of confidence," said Atrix president Steven Riedel.
Atrix manufactures remote metering and copy control products as well as toner vacuums, vacuum filters and printed circuit board cases for instrumentation for field service organizations.
